publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1033.1 Mr Jamie McGrigor: The Historic Environment, A Valuable Resource for Scotlandâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-1033) in the name of Mr Frank McAveety, insert at end "and believes that Historic Scotland, in its policies, must be mindful of the immense benefits to employment, income and culture brought by tourism and, in particular, art and archaeological tourism."
